alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:09PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rockbridge, north central Bedford and northern Amherst Counties and the City of Buena Vista through 1145 PM EDT... At 1109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Snowden, or near Glasgow, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista... Glasgow... Forks Of Buffalo... Clifford... Big Island... Cornwall... and Snowden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
